instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.mainInstruction: Think about the activities you did yesterday. Then, fill in the full timeline with the activities you did.

step1.title: Select and Place an Activity
step1.horizontal: Choose an activity from the menu at the bottom of the screen, then place it on the timeline.
step1.vertical: Tap the (+) button in the bottom right corner to open the activity menu, then select an activity and tap where you want to place it on the timeline.

step2.title: Adjust Activity Duration
step2.horizontal: Click and drag the edges horizontally to set the duration.
step2.vertical: Drag the edges vertically to set the duration.

step3.title: Submit Your Diary
step3.description: Once you've recorded all your activities for the day, click the Submit button to complete your diary.
step3.submitHelp: Click to submit your completed diary

instructions.undoHelp: Did you make a mistake? Reverse your last action
instructions.cleanRowHelp: Want to start over? Clean the row
instructions.customActivityHelp: Activity not listed? Add a custom activity

confirmSubmit.title: Are you sure?
confirmSubmit.message: You will not be able to change your responses.

loading.title: Submitting your diary...
loading.message: Please wait while we save your responses.
